participant_1.background:
I remember my father coming home at night after a long shift and telling me stories about his day.
i love to go to the lake.
On the weekend I like to go to the beach to relax and have fun.
I comfort myself with my dolls.
my parents were scientists.

participant_2.background:
I once pretended to be my girlfriend, Luis, in order to get out of a speeding ticket.
as a child , i won a national spelling bee.
my favorite truck is a chevy duramax.
I'm a busy mom who is always on the go, but I always make time for my morning coffee.
I wish I knew where I belonged in the world, but my gummy worm collection is a comfort to me.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
It's going well, thanks for asking! Just hanging out at home.
Same here! I'm getting ready to make some dinner. What are you up to?
I'm about to make some coffee! I love the smell of fresh coffee in the morning.
I love coffee too! It's the best way to start the day.
I agree! What kind of coffee do you like to drink?
I like to drink black coffee, but I'll also have a latte or cappuccino every once in a while.
I like to drink iced coffee in the summer and hot coffee in the winter.
Me too! I love iced coffee on a hot day.
So what do you do for fun?
I like to go to the beach, read, and spend time with my family.
I love to go to the beach too! I like to swim, sunbathe, and build sandcastles.
Me too! I also like to play in the waves.
I have to say, I'm a little jealous of your gummy worm collection. I've always wanted one!
You're welcome to come over and look at it anytime!
Thanks! I might just take you up on that offer.
